text: Boyarin Orsha () is a 1909 Russian silent drama movie directed by Pyotr Chardynin. It stars Andrey Gromov, Pyotr Chardynin, and Aleksandra Goncharova. == Actors == * Andrey Gromov as Arseniy * Pyotr Chardynin as Orsha * Aleksandra Goncharova as Orsha's daughter == References == ==Other websites== * Category:Russian drama movies Category:Russian silent movies Category:1909 drama movies Category:Movies directed by Pyotr Chardynin
title: Boyarin Orsha (movie)
